tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited for Crown fixation
Dr. soma Sekhar is very friendly and explained us how the treatment is done. He took all his time to answer our questions and made sure that we are comfortable all through the treatment. 
We are overall happy with the treatment and observed no hassle all through.
* *** *** **** ** *** ** *** ****** ******* **** ** *********

I'm very happy that I visited Ln dental tolichowki branch for tooth pain treatment then I met Dr soma sekhar who explained me properly the treatment process and as explained it went very well without any pain he did his crown specialist treatment and I'm able to chew happily after 6 months I would really thank Dr soma sekhar for helping me out of this pain thank you dr

Had issue with chewing so came to LN dental for replacement of teeth , Dr somasekhar sajja has done a wonderful job in doing the treatment he has done the implant treatment without any pain I'm really satisfied with treatment done by him 
I had great experience here in Ln dental

I had a sleepless night due to tooth pain so I visited dr soma Sekhar sajja he advised for root canal treatment and followed by cap as he said it will be a painless treatment and I went for it as he said he did the treatment very nicely without pain thank you so much doctor u made the treatment very comfortable

Really satisfied with Dr soma sekhar sajja treatment I would really recommend this dr becoz he understands your problems and he gives possibilities of treatment outcome he treated me very gently even though I asked many questions he politely answers all the questions iam very much satisfied with the treatment
